CustomField.description: Enables deletion of any insight element in any namespace, both on the insight element list page and via Apex. Should only be enabled for a specific user. Do not enable this setting for the org.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enables deletion of any smart element in any namespace, both on the smart element list page and via Apex. Should only be enabled for a specific user. Do not enable this setting for the org.
CustomField.label: Delete insight element in any namespace
